title: UFC : most knockdowns landed by fighters worldwide as of March 2020
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of knockdowns landed in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of knockdowns landed is appeared to be the highest at Month Donald Cerrone and lowest at Month Thiago Alves.
The Number of knockdowns landed of Month Thiago Alves is 1.54% smaller than the maximum value at Donald Cerrone.
